name: The Last Hover Cabby in Sector G
name_original: The Last Hover Cabby in Sector G
description:
Ol' G-Town ain't what it used to be. 

Most of Sector G's transportation systems are handled by the vacu-lifts these days, but the city hasn't taken the hover-grid out of commission yet. For someone who knows their way around a hover-cab, there's money to be made.

That's where you come in, fresh outta cryo-jail and low on prospects. If you can scratch together 3000 creds that'll be enough for a pass to Sector F, and who knows, maybe a better life.
